events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible. The product is completely different from what I ordered.
The issue has been categorized as a Refund request due to customer's dissatisfaction with the delivered product.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect item delivered to the customer.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear that you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received? This will help us process your refund quickly.
Sure, my order number is 546732, and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect item that arrived instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 5 business days. Please keep the incorrect item as you do not need to return it.
That sounds great, thanks for the quick resolution and for not requiring the item to be sent back.
Your refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount credited in your account within a few business days.
Just following up to ensure that you have received your refund and everything is satisfactory on your end. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since the refund was successfully credited and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
